original_text: But I said, “Should such a man as I run away? And what man such as I could go into the temple and live? I will not go in.”
korean_text: 내가 이르기를 나 같은 자가 어찌 도망하며 나 같은 몸이면 누가 외소에 들어가서 생명을 보존하겠느냐 나는 들어가지 않겠노라 하고

sentences.original_text: Should such a man as I run away?
And what man such as I could go into the temple and live?
sentences.korean_translation: 또 나 같은 사람이 어찌 성전에 들어가 살 수 있겠느냐?
